text: Hugo Brandt Corstius (29 August 1935 - 28 February 2014) was a Dutch journalist, columnist and writer. He known for his success in both literature and science. He was born in Eindhoven, North Brabant. Brandt Corstius died after a long illness on 28 February 2014 in Amsterdam, North Holland. He was 78 years old. He was outlived by his children, journalists Aaf (born 1975) and Jelle (born 1978). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in the Netherlands Category:Dutch academics Category:Dutch columnists Category:Dutch computer scientists Category:Dutch journalists Category:Dutch mathematicians Category:Linguists Category:People from Eindhoven Category:Writers from North Brabant
title: Hugo Brandt Corstius
